Notes: The inflected forms are as follows:*avnd_(masc. sg.),*avr(masc. pl.),*ad(fem. sg.). As for the fem./neut. pl. form, external data shows*avto be most archaic. The formadavhas obviously developed by analogy withad; as for Naikianda, it is unclear.

There's also a possibility of devoicing in Naikri through assimilation.
